name: crbates.github.com
body:
### Cameron Bates 
##### Nuclear Instrumentation Specialist

### About Me
I'm a nuclear engineering graduate student currently based in the bay area. My primary research focus is developing novel radiation detection systems to solve nuclear safeguards and non-proliferation issues. 

### Projects
I am part of the development team for [pyne](https://github.com/pyne/pyne) 

I wrote a small plugin to ipython to be able to do simple interactive plots without matplotlib: [ipython-flot](https://github.com/crbates/ipython-flot)

I have dabbled in AJAX interaction with python with [pyjax](https://github.com/crbates/pyjax)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
